content.webTitle: Best pictures of the day - live

fields.headline: Best pictures of the day - live
fields.bodyText: Unemployment in 1972: The Guardian's Robert Smithies Picture from the past Here's an Instagram from Guardian photographer David Levene who is photographing the town of Rjukan in Norway where giant mirrors have been erected to deflect the sun's rays into the town Here's our Eyewitness from the top of the Burj Khalifa building Here's an entry from our GuardianWitness assignment on the first world war
